title: Professor’s Paper
subtitle: Did a student turn in an old term paper as his own work, only to discover it was written by his professor?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A student who belongs to a fraternity that keeps a file of members’ papers and exams sifts through the stack and selects a several-year-old term paper to copy and resubmit.  When he gets his paper back from the professor, it includes a grade of ‘A’ and the prof’s comment, “When I wrote this paper as a freshman it only received a ‘C’, and I always thought it was worth more.”
